txt_en: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
txt_cn: 没有欢笑的一天便最是虚度。
author: E. E. Cummings

txt_en: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
txt_cn: 你无法阻止衰老，但你不一定要变老。
author: George Burns

txt_en: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
txt_cn: 唯有那些敢于冒险大步向前的人，才能够了解自己能走多远。
author: T. S. Eliot

txt_en: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
txt_cn: 不要被头脑中的恐惧牵制，让心中的梦想指引着你。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
txt_cn: 只要一个人透过爱、友谊、义愤或怜悯，使他人的生活变美好，他的生命就有价值。
author: Simone de Beauvoir

txt_en: To do nothing is the way to be nothing.
txt_cn: 无所事事终将一事无成。
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

txt_en: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
txt_cn: 一盎司的行动，价值相当于一吨的理论。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
txt_cn: 如果我看得更远，那是因为我站在巨人的肩膀上。
author: Isaac Newton

txt_en: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
txt_cn: 别害怕自己的恐惧，它让你知道有些事情值得去做。
author: C. JoyBell C.

txt_en: No amount of anxiety makes any difference to anything that is going to happen.
txt_cn: 再焦虑也不能改变即将要发生的事。
author: Alan Watts

txt_en: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
txt_cn: 决定不做什么同决定做什么一样重要。
author: Steve Jobs

txt_en: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
txt_cn: 拥抱，是让你一句话也不用说，就让别人知道你爱他们。
author: Bil Keane

txt_en: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
txt_cn: 不管你实现了多少目标，总要定睛于下一个更远大的。
author: Jessica Henwick

txt_en: The greatest test of courage is to bear defeat without losing heart.
txt_cn: 接受失败而不气馁是对勇气最大的考验。
author: Robert Ingersoll

txt_en: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
txt_cn: 幸福是责任自然而然生出的花朵。
author: Phillips Brooks

txt_en: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other one thing.
txt_cn: 牢记一点，你想要成功的决心比其他任何事情都重要。
author: Abraham Lincoln

txt_en: In the end, life teaches us what is important, and that is family.
txt_cn: 生活最终会让我们明白什么最重要，那就是家庭。
author: Stephen Covey

txt_en: You are not beaten until you admit it.
txt_cn: 在你承认之前，你尚未失败。
author: George Patton

txt_en: Life is the sum of all your choices.
txt_cn: 你做的所有抉择造就了你的人生。
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
txt_cn: 人生的低谷成为了我重建生活的坚实基础。
author: J. K. Rowling
